I am a senior in high school, and I live in New York City.
I was one of those kids that my mom would tell me, "don't touch the fire."
I was obedient, I wouldn't touch the fire,...
...but I'll probably throw stuff at it and make a bigger fire.
I was always very adventurous and curious,...
...and that's why I got into computer science...
...'cause I was always curious about how things worked.
Well, other than computer science, I'm into sports.
